org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode

Class ClusterJspHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.ClusterJspHelper

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
 class ClusterJspHelper
extends Object
    This class generates the data that is needed to be displayed on cluster web console.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  ClusterJspHelper.ClusterStatus
      This class contains cluster statistics.
      static class  ClusterJspHelper.DecommissionStates
      cluster-wide decommission state of a datanode
      (package private) static class  ClusterJspHelper.DecommissionStatus
      This class consolidates the decommissioning datanodes information in the cluster and generates decommissioning reports in XML.
      (package private) static class  ClusterJspHelper.NamenodeMXBeanHelper
      Class for connecting to Namenode over http via JmxJsonServlet to get JMX attributes exposed by the MXBean.
      (package private) static class  ClusterJspHelper.NamenodeStatus
      This class stores namenode statistics to be used to generate cluster web console report.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClusterJspHelper

    • Method Detail

      • generateClusterHealthReport

        ClusterJspHelper.ClusterStatus generateClusterHealthReport()
        JSP helper function that generates cluster health report. When encountering exception while getting Namenode status, the exception will be listed on the page with corresponding stack trace.

      • generateDecommissioningReport

        ClusterJspHelper.DecommissionStatus generateDecommissioningReport()
        Helper function that generates the decommissioning report. Connect to each Namenode over http via JmxJsonServlet to collect the data nodes status.

      • getDecommissionNodeClusterState

        private void getDecommissionNodeClusterState(Map<String,Map<String,String>> statusMap)
        Based on the state of the datanode at each namenode, marks the overall state of the datanode across all the namenodes, to one of the following:
        1. ClusterJspHelper.DecommissionStates.DECOMMISSIONED
        2. ClusterJspHelper.DecommissionStates.DECOMMISSION_INPROGRESS
        3. ClusterJspHelper.DecommissionStates.PARTIALLY_DECOMMISSIONED
        4. ClusterJspHelper.DecommissionStates.UNKNOWN
        Parameters:
        statusMap - map whose key is datanode, value is an inner map with key being namenode, value being decommission state.

      • updateUnknownStatus

        private void updateUnknownStatus(Map<String,Map<String,String>> statusMap,
                       List<String> unreportedNn)
        update unknown status in datanode status map for every unreported namenode

      • getDatanodeHttpPort

        private int getDatanodeHttpPort(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)

      • getProperty

        private static org.codehaus.jackson.JsonNode getProperty(String props,
                                        String propertyname)
                                                  throws IOException
        In order to query a namenode mxbean, a http connection in the form of "http://hostname/jmx?qry=Hadoop:service=NameNode,name=NameNodeInfo" is sent to namenode. JMX attributes are exposed via JmxJsonServelet on the namenode side.
        Throws:
        IOException
